titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Methodist Episcopal Church in Brooklyn quarterly conference minutes 1973.294
titlestmt.author: Matthew Gorham
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 11:15:48 +0000.

did.unittitle: Methodist Episcopal Church in Brooklyn quarterly conference minutes

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Methodist Episcopal Church (Brooklyn, New York, N.Y.)

did.abstract: Bound handwritten minutes of the quarterly conference of the Methodist Episcopal Church in Brooklyn, spanning the period 1824 to 1834. The minutes contain lists of meeting attendants and brief notes on the types of business transacted.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Methodist Episcopal Church in Brooklyn quarterly conference minutes, 1973.294, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition unknown.
